channel.title: DevastationX [317/pi]
channel.description:
Client download: http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?rijr8sp54bbfm2w (already set to 127.0.0.1) Source download: http://www.mediafire.com/?osf5zjrfuhguxjx use trisidiax cache here: http://www.mediafire.com/?b9bqx4807gz3066
Orginal Topic: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,556664.msg4074539.html#msg4074539
[size=18pt]Things i added: Added RFD chest at home, you can now sell paramaya ticket for 25m and ship ticket for 20m, changed prices&shops, better stats for yellow and green whip, added items to donator shop,nomad and avatar of destruction added, fixed rollbacks, ::getid and ::empty command, custom crowns, autocache downloader, Mystery boxex (itemid= 3062)[/size]
Commands: [shadow=red,left]Player commands: ::train2 (medium train arena) ::forums (takes you to the forum link) ::train (low train arena) ::pkp (to see how many pk points you got) ::rules (type this command before anything else) ::commands (see some of the commands ingame [not all]) ::logout (if you cant logout type this command) ::empty (removes your inventory) ::mithdrags (teleports you to mithril dragons) ::cool (sends a cool message) ::withdraw (amount) ::report (playername) ::afk (type this if your away from keyboard) ::back (when your back) ::changepassword (new password) ::trade (teleports you to a trade arena) ::unsit (to jump off your chair) ::yell (you know what this is) ::kdr (see your kills/deaths radio) ::sit (gives you a little chair to sit on) ::slevel (tells your slayer level) ::players (see who and how many players online) ::vote4cash (if you want to vote and get auto rewarded) ::claim (type this after you voted) ::back (only type this if you did ::afk before) ::redeem (gives you killstreak reward) ::getksreward (gives you killstreak reward) ::help (type this if you need help) ::rank (says your rank) Donator commands: ::dice ::dicing info |you can go to donator zone,enter donator shops,reset your stats,custom yell,change spell book,change slayer task| Moderator commands: ::jail (to jail a player) ::timedmute (::timedmute-playername-time) ::mute (to mute a player) ::unmute (to unmute a player) ::timedban (::timedban-playername-time) ::ban (to ban a player) ::unban (to unban a player) ::xteleto (::xteleto-username) ::checkbank (::checkbank-username) ::checkinv (::checkinv-playername) leave your items to bank before you do this! ::kick (to kick a player) ::unjail (to unjail a player)
Administrator commands: ::alert (to send a alert message) ::bank (open up bank) ::ipmute (ipmuting a player) ::object (adding objects) ::mypos (shows yours coords) ::shop (::shop-1) ::checkinv (leave your inventory items to bank before doing this) ::tele (::tele-coords-coords) ::xteletome (tele a player to you) ::reloadshops (refilling shops) ::getip (getting players ip) ::fhome (::fhome-username) ::ban (ban a player) ::xteleto (teleporting to a player) ::npc (spawns an npc) ::unipmute (unipmute a player) ::ipban (ipban a player) ::unban (unban a player)
owner commands: ::restart (restarts server) ::empty (removes your inventory) ::setlevel (::setlevel-levelid-amount-playername) ::bank (opens bank) ::heal (healing you) ::item (to spawn items) ::update (::update-time) ::who (::who-playername) ::pure (gives you pure stats) ::unpc (unpc you) ::levelids (shows all level id's)
[/shadow]
Media: [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/9av9rb.jpg[/img][IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/5nvhi9.jpg[/img][IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/2q24wfs.jpg[/img][IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/xm7msi.jpg[/img][IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/d8qr6.jpg[/img][IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/10r71wp.jpg[/img][IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/34q8ny9.jpg[/img][IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/fvil3k.jpg[/img][IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/swa4qf.jpg[/img][IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/vg0gle.jpg[/img][IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/3522cjo.jpg[/img][IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/1j3x3a.jpg[/img][IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/vy5xyd.jpg[/img][IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/9rodjo.jpg[/img][IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/2m7d7qd.jpg[/img][IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/20gnnro.jpg[/img][IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/3z9xl.jpg[/img] Boss Video (NOT ALL BOSSES) http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_esphqarqAA&feature=plcp
Credits: 95% to TrisidiaX for hes source 5% to me Thanks for Reading! //Jens <([shadow=red,left]killerjens9[/shadow])>

item.title: DevastationX [317/pi]
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

nickypie:

why do people download a source, change the name and move npc’s around and then re-release it. It makes no sense and doesn’t make you look good. There should be a separate board for just these kinds of servers.

Welcome to MoparScape. You’re doing it right.

Read full topic

item.description:

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

I request a lock[/quote]Requesting a lock on someone else’s topic is stupid, unless there is logical reasoning behind it.

On Point: Doesn’t look any different from the other releases, hopefully your next release will be a bit more original. Good luck.

Read full topic

item.title: DevastationX [317/pi]
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

Instead of doing that, utilize a Developmental Log with what YOU have done. Here’s an example of what one looks like:

Key: SS = Server-sided, CS = Client-sided

Past Updates:

  • Player V.S. N.P.C. Combat removed from the Base. (SS)

  • Server contents packaged. (SS)

  • 40 new folders created in total. (SS)

  • Client class reduced to 184K.B. (SS)

  • Added a recreation of the 289 Revision’s Prayer Tab. (CS)

  • Player to Player Trading has been removed. (SS)

  • Text Method optimized for grammar purposes. (SS)

  • New Debugging methods added. (SS/CS)

  • Player to Player Following has been removed. (SS)

  • All Scroll-Bars have been removed. (CS)

Read full topic

item.title: DevastationX [317/pi]
item.dc:creator: @killerjens9 killerjens9
item.description:
@killerjens9 wrote:

Client download: http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?rijr8sp54bbfm2w (already set to 127.0.0.1)
Source download: http://www.mediafire.com/?osf5zjrfuhguxjx
use trisidiax cache here: http://www.mediafire.com/?b9bqx4807gz3066

Orginal Topic: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,556664.msg4074539.html#msg4074539

[size=18pt]Things i added: Added RFD chest at home, you can now sell paramaya ticket for 25m and ship ticket for 20m, changed prices&shops, better stats for yellow and green whip, added items to donator shop,nomad and avatar of destruction added, fixed rollbacks, ::getid and ::empty command, custom crowns, autocache downloader, Mystery boxex (itemid= 3062)[/size]

Commands:
[shadow=red,left]Player commands:
::train2 (medium train arena)
::forums (takes you to the forum link)
::train (low train arena)
::pkp (to see how many pk points you got)
::rules (type this command before anything else)
::commands (see some of the commands ingame [not all])
::logout (if you cant logout type this command)
::empty (removes your inventory)
::mithdrags (teleports you to mithril dragons)
::cool (sends a cool message)
::withdraw (amount)
::report (playername)
::afk (type this if your away from keyboard)
::back (when your back)
::changepassword (new password)
::trade (teleports you to a trade arena)
::unsit (to jump off your chair)
::yell (you know what this is)
::kdr (see your kills/deaths radio)
::sit (gives you a little chair to sit on)
::slevel (tells your slayer level)
::players (see who and how many players online)
::vote4cash (if you want to vote and get auto rewarded)
::claim (type this after you voted)
::back (only type this if you did ::afk before)
::redeem (gives you killstreak reward)
::getksreward (gives you killstreak reward)
::help (type this if you need help)
::rank (says your rank)
Donator commands:
::dice
::dicing
info |you can go to donator zone,enter donator shops,reset your stats,custom yell,change spell book,change slayer task|
Moderator commands:
::jail (to jail a player)
::timedmute (::timedmute-playername-time)
::mute (to mute a player)
::unmute (to unmute a player)
::timedban (::timedban-playername-time)
::ban (to ban a player)
::unban (to unban a player)
::xteleto (::xteleto-username)
::checkbank (::checkbank-username)
::checkinv (::checkinv-playername) leave your items to bank before you do this!
::kick (to kick a player)
::unjail (to unjail a player)

Administrator commands:
::alert (to send a alert message)
::bank (open up bank)
::ipmute (ipmuting a player)
::object (adding objects)
::mypos (shows yours coords)
::shop (::shop-1)
::checkinv (leave your inventory items to bank before doing this)
::tele (::tele-coords-coords)
::xteletome (tele a player to you)
::reloadshops (refilling shops)
::getip (getting players ip)
::fhome (::fhome-username)
::ban (ban a player)
::xteleto (teleporting to a player)
::npc (spawns an npc)
::unipmute (unipmute a player)
::ipban (ipban a player)
::unban (unban a player)

owner commands:
::restart (restarts server)
::empty (removes your inventory)
::setlevel (::setlevel-levelid-amount-playername)
::bank (opens bank)
::heal (healing you)
::item (to spawn items)
::update (::update-time)
::who (::who-playername)
::pure (gives you pure stats)
::unpc (unpc you)
::levelids (shows all level id’s)

[/shadow]
